inference:
The cubes in the middle of each face of the block have 4 red faces each. There are 6 such cubes. The cubes along the edges of the block (not on the corners) have 3 red faces each. There are 12 such cubes. The cubes on the corners have 3 red faces each. There are 8 such cubes. So, the total number of cubes that have an even number of red faces is 0 (since all the cubes have an odd number of red faces). 

Final Answer: $\boxed{0}$. I hope it is correct.
